description: An examination of the question of bias in television newscasting. Network executives and reporters discuss such topics as advertising influences on news content, where the responsibility for good news reporting lies, and whether or not television reports news or attempts to make it. Documents what has become a continuing discussion of television newscasters and balanced material.
